name: Todo App Maintenance Team
description: A team specialized in maintaining and enhancing a Python todo application by fixing bugs, adding features, and updating documentation.

edges.description: After diagnosing the bug, delegate the implementation of fixes and features.
Upon implementing the fixes and new features, delegate the task of testing.
After testing, delegate to the documenter to update the README and document changes.
If issues are found during testing, return the task to the developer for fixes.
